title: Warning: hacked device
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: This cell was hacked to function and completely locked up as corporate cell after a factory reset. No option to install/delete any apps or perform another reset. Seller was not willing to exchange as this only became visible after the 90day warranty period. I consider this fraud and have reported it accordingly.
author: F
